lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact on the lives of people around the world by showing them God's love in a practical way. I understand what a big impact a loan can make on a business, especially in a country where money is hard to come by.
lender.occupational_info: I am writing a book on the names of God and I run a business painting rental homes before new tenants move in.

lender.name: Mommy_of_Misty
lender.loan_because: We are born-again Christians, and we care. It is an honor to be able to help someone support themselves better. We believe Jesus would help.
lender.occupational_info: We raise sheep and peacocks. We are a home-schooling family, as well.

lender.name: jsab
lender.loan_because: ...I experience the love that I am when I share it with others.
lender.occupational_info: I teach others the importance of proper nutrition and positive peaceful emotions for the purpose of achieving optimal physical and mental health.

lender.name: Héctor & Juanita Soto
lender.loan_because: it's so important give the oportunity to people with almost no resources to be self-dependent and proud of it! Ayudar no cuesta nada!
lender.occupational_info: Maintenance and cleaning services along the Triangle Area NC

lender.name: Michael and Joyce
lender.loan_because: We loan because it helps others.
lender.occupational_info: It takes a nurse to save a life.

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you give the littlest amount of money you can still be happy about what you did. You will also be very proud to help people in need. I'm proud of what I am doing

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: Where else can so little (by our standards) accomplish so much?

lender.name: AMELIA
lender.loan_because: NO TENGO MEDIOS ECONOMICOS PARA EMPRENDER UN CENTRO DE RELAJAMIENTO
lender.occupational_info: MUY IMPORTANTE PARA TODOS LOS SERES HUMANOS POR VIVIR MUY APRESURADO Y SE PRSENTAN MUCHO ESTRES

lender.name: The Pipher Family
lender.loan_because: We have a wonderful family and a wonderful life...and although I can only loan a little, I hope it still help's someone else find their dream.

lender.name: Luc
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I draw pictures for poster, books, and magazines.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I know that a sound and healthy family is the basis of good community and the best way to support this idea is to make the family financially independent.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Registered Nurse caring for people who are too sick to care for themselves. My mother used to say 'we do for others what they cannot do for themselves'. And when they get well, they go back to their life and loved ones. It is a caring work, requiring high level technical skills, on-going training and education, determination, intelligence and flexibility. It is not well paid but it is challenging every day.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
i've been annoyingly poor; & am now comfortably numb. This makes me a seriously pink Floyd (http://bit.ly/eXnAuZ). I enjoy the music of Alan Hovhaness, Harry Partch, Humphrey Searle & La Monte Young (http://bit.ly/hqbmj7) - also The Reels (http://mysp.ac/4vIw8q), Brian Eno, Bob Log III (http://bit.ly/bGmGI) & Henry Rollins (http://bit.ly/aXAToL)
My favourite writers are Stephen Fry (http://bit.ly/Rnj), Samuel Beckett (http://bit.ly/bTEIYd) & Dr Hunter S Thompson (http://bit.ly/cMiX1B), my favourite artists are Charlotte Moorman, Ray & Charles Eames (http://bit.ly/d9XLbu), Yoko Ono (http://bit.ly/14N7tO) & Carolee Schneemann (http://bit.ly/3gFUxV), my favourite blog is Nana Visitor's (http://bit.ly/94gPLf), my favourite tv show is Star trek: Deep space 9 (http://bit.ly/gw6Qaa) & my favourite film is Vertical Features remake (http://imdb.to/hRORl6). The odds are good that you haven't heard of many of these names
I strongly suspect that this is my problem, not yours
I support dispersed computing using the BOINC platform (http://bit.ly/aH3o1W), write (when i can),buy art (when i can afford to) as & support people through other crowd-sourced funding sites such as http://www.wokai.org, http://www.goodreturn.org (charitable) & http://www.kickstarter.com, http://www.pozible.com, Pledgemusic & Indiegogo.com; but Kiva - & my most beautiful Teresa - remain my most important life-affirmation
I suppose all this means that i'm just another Wile E Quixote in denial. If you forced me, i'd have to admit that i know that the damn things are windmills but i still choose to exercise my right to tilt at them anyway. After all, one day they might be giants, & that's when i'll really need the practice....
lender.occupational_info: Carting bloody big boxes out of 10m shipping crates, amongst other things. These crates are made of metal, which isn't pleasant during lightning strikes. I also drive a forklift truck, make computers do something ressembling what they are supposed to & try to be nice on the phone, not necessarily in that order

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings bestowed upon me with others.

lender.name: Bas
lender.loan_because: We all need a little help following our dreams...

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: Empower people to improve their lives without making them feel like beggars.
lender.occupational_info: Working at a school for school for general health and hospital care ICU nurse Palliative Care Nurse

lender.name: najla
lender.loan_because: its our duty to help each others.and i just started my own busness and i understand who difficult it can be,so ihope ican make it little bet easy for others
lender.occupational_info: i work in tax department in kuwait,and i have my own business(healthy food co)

lender.name: Kenta
lender.loan_because: I want to support people who are taking challenges to improve their life or to realize their dream. By interacting with such people, I can get motivation to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am selling financial products to pension funds. Financial product is a system which assembles many people’s money to make investments. Pension fund is a place where people save money when they are young to spend when they got old.

lender.name: Renze
lender.loan_because: a small loan can change the life of many.
lender.occupational_info: I am a banker for corporate lending in the Netherlands.

lender.name: Mae
lender.loan_because: It's blessing enough to have the opportunity to provide my kids a comfortable living environment as they grow that other parents cannot because of poverty. With this program, I am able to lend other people a little bit of what I have to improve their livelihood and in return provide their children shelter, education, food, clothing, etc.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to live their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I keep America safe. Sleep well!

lender.name: timsan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others

lender.name: Karel
lender.loan_because: sharing is the best way to change the world

lender.name: Tina & Jonathan
lender.loan_because: God first loaned to us. Or something like that.
lender.occupational_info: We're still trying to figure it out!

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I design books, magazines and other things.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Giving a helping hand.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: El amor

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I wish to share with others so they may prosper.

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: I'm able to

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I truly belief micro credits can help people to establish an independent source of income.

lender.name: suesie
lender.loan_because: The world is such a big place and it's so easy to be over looked. I have a woderful job that I love and I want to help other women have the same opportunity. I want them to experience the respect that comes from doing something you love.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a computer to design printed materials that will be used to advertise products for a liquor distributor. I create ads, window signs, menus, invitations, etc. I use the programs Photoshop, Illustrator and InDesign. I am also a photographer and enjoy shooting pictures of nature.

lender.name: sarah
lender.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lender.name: CONSTANCE
lender.occupation: MEMBER OF JOINING HANDS PARTNER GROUP WITH PERU

lender.name: Jana
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone establish and grow their business. A $25 loan can make such a huge difference to a person struggling to keep their business afloat.
lender.occupational_info: President of sustainable hardwood forest products and fossil fuels corporation. I also work part-time in a rare bookstore, just for fun!

lender.name: Tim Grimes
lender.loan_because: I have a desire to bless people because I have been blessed
lender.occupational_info: I lead a team of people that sell professional development solutions that help companies enhance their employees work experience and achieve their team and company mission

lender.name: Kristen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children ages 5-10.

lender.name: Denny
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be able to help.

lender.name: jose
lender.loan_because: necesito un microcredito para crear mi propia panaderia y salir adelante con mi familia de 10.000$
lender.occupational_info: es interesente y sobre todo genera empleo y buenos ingresos

lender.name: ron
lender.loan_because: this is a nice and practical way to help people who are poor.
lender.occupational_info: I am a geography and history teacher and I also have a centre where I help students to make and learn their homework,

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help someone achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Manager for top Floor Covering Company

lender.name: Raysel
lender.loan_because: I love to help people who help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. This is from my savings.

lender.name: Maria Eugenia
lender.loan_because: I want to help. It's difficult to start a business on your own. Quiero ayudar. Es difícil iniciar un negocio propio.
lender.occupational_info: I design spaces Diseño espacios

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to lead by example.
lender.occupational_info: I am student who wants to become a doctor for people who do not have access to healthcare.

lender.name: Kelly & Joe
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and it's a great way to help out individuals in a tangible way.
lender.occupational_info: Joe helps turn trees into paper, Kelly helps groups build social housing.

lender.name: Cris y Mika
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I started my own e-commerce business selling Colombian Coffee to help me through College. One of my best friends believed in me and helped me financially in order for me to achieve my business goals. I think it is time to pay it forward and this website enables me to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I currently work in New Product Development for a leading Semiconductor Company (www.freescale.com). I drive products (from a concept to final manufacturing) that are used in a wide spectrum of applications in the cellular infrastructure business. One of our main products we sell are Power Amplifiers for cellular basestations.

lender.name: Temitope
lender.loan_because: It gives other people an opportunity

lender.name: José & Tara
lender.loan_because: It makes us feel good to be able to help others in the developing world knowing that only a small contribution can help families improve their lives.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to live in a developed country.

lender.name: Brian Setzler
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of small, local enterprises to transform lives.
lender.occupational_info: I have an MBA in Sustainable Business and am the founder of a triple-bottom line accounting firm located in Portland, Oregon, USA. My mission is to help change the world by making shifts at the paradigm level.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: As a teacher I worked with young adults who had special needs and abilities. I feel that everyone has something to contribute and everyone has the ability to make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Svetlana
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power we common people have to change the world and because the more you have, the more you should give

lender.name: chica69
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful and want to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a hospital taking x-rays

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I want to help make the world a better place
lender.occupational_info: I teach at a high school . My students are 19 and older and do not speak English. They have not had the opportunity to complete high school in their country.

lender.name: Margie
lender.loan_because:
I want to help their dreams come true.
"Like a bolt out of the blue Fate steps in and sees you through When you wish upon a star Your dreams come true"
~~Lyrics from the movie Pinocchio

lender.name: Fred (Friar)
lender.loan_because: As an American I have been fortunate all of my life to not want for comfort, food, money, or a job. I look at the people I can help and think that there but for the grace of God I could be one of them. I pray that I can help them one day to be prosperous, comfortable, and have no worries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional writer who assists American companies in bidding on international contracts all over the world.

lender.name: Guido
lender.loan_because: I beleave that happiness comes by giving.

lender.name: Kevin and Arancha
lender.loan_because: Because I choose to.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: From the moment I came into this world, opportunity was mine - for no other reason than I had the good fortune to be born where I was. I know what seems like a small sum of money to me can extend opportunity to someone who didn't stumble across that same fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I assist motorists who were involved in automobile collisions.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I can and we should.
lender.occupational_info: My career involves helping a team of people offer mortgages and other financial solutions to the general public, as well as advice and direction on how to best organize their finances to reach their goals.

lender.name: Familia Pires
lender.occupation: A software developer, a teacher, a baby and a cat!
lender.loan_because: We believe the world can be a better place.

lender.name: Luc
lender.loan_because: I believe in lending money to entrepreneurs who take initiative in changing the way they live and work, rather than donating money as a form of charity.
lender.occupational_info: We add form, function and feeling to products and interiors.

lender.name: Cheri
lender.loan_because: I want to help hard working people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Stephen C
lender.loan_because: Kiva has allowed me to make loans, so people can help themselves in a way that is respectful to their dignity.

lender.name: BAUDILIO
lender.loan_because: I LOVE TO HELP WORKING HARD PEOPLE
lender.occupational_info: selling product from my country Puerto Rico via e commerce world wide

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I believe micro-lending is an effective way to put money directly in the hands of entrepeneurial people. It not only fosters peace and democracy, but helps developing countries grow their economies indigenously.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I love seeing people given a chance to live out their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a college student who will hopefully be able to make a difference in many people's lives.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone has been in the situation when a little help makes all the difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I look after a group of students who are studying to become chiropractors.

lender.name: Tywanna
lender.loan_because: I care about others.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in finding and purchasing homes or selling their current home in Maryland.

lender.name: Sisou
lender.loan_because: It is true...a little does go a long way.

lender.name: Yvette
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: heltos
lender.loan_because: we feel it will reach the people you want to help and not be tie up in paper work
lender.occupational_info: pga golf professional and my friend is a dentist

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I want to help make this world a better place....

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
I believe that this is a way in which we can help other people in the long term.
“Give a man a fish; you have fed him for today. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime”

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I like being able to assist other individuals.

lender.name: Kazuko
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: TLit
lender.loan_because: the world needs to be changed, and this is a small part that I can take part in.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying in university to learn how I can change the world.

lender.name: Wedding Accessories
lender.loan_because: Life is good and it's time to share.

lender.name: Michael & Shelley
lender.loan_because: We care & we're fortunate enough to be able to.

lender.name: Izzy
lender.loan_because: Coming from South America myself, I understand the plight of people who don't have access to the opportunities that the developed world offers. This is one way for me to change this.
lender.occupational_info: I do web development for a NYC-based company

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: Its a wonderful opportunity to be able to help another person.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of micro-loans. So simple; so powerful.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I have a very good life and I want to give back so other children's parents can make a good life for them.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a baby.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: That's just the way I am.
lender.occupational_info: I like to think of myself as a Humanitarian.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: It helps other people improve their lives.

lender.name: Alexander Burke
lender.loan_because: Microcredit has been proven to improve the world one small business at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I design, support, maintain, and fix computer systems that help run schools, businesses, universities, and governments.

lender.name: Dee
lender.loan_because: The best answer I've seen for this is the man who said "Because I can." Travel reminds me how wealthy we lucky few are compared to so many people in developing countries. It's a time in my life (retirement) to "do something." This is an amazing concept in action. Brilliantly simple and incredibly powerful.
lender.occupational_info: I worked many years in natural resource management with the Alaska Department of Natural Resources. For the last 15 years I worked with Alaska Native Corporations on land planning projects.

lender.name: Ivan
lender.loan_because: I want to help. Everybody needs help. It's my turn to help God bless you. Mucha suerte para todos. Que Dios les bendiga.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I would much rather my money help a small business than a large corporation.
lender.occupational_info: I work in outside plant Telecommunications construction.

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: Hola mi nombre es Byron Jácome Z. tengo 28 años y necesito un prestamo para la creación de un centro educativo dentro del mercado electrónico, donde se brindará la enseñanaza de comecialización de negocios dentro de la internet, la cuál permitira a las personas expandir sus negocios y crear negocios, mejorando asi su productividad y calidad de vida. Cuento con una estrucura propia pero no con el capital de que requiero para la adecuación y maquinaria necesaria para empezar este gran proyecto solidario ya que con una minima inversión de 5 mensual las personas podrán aprender a mejorar sus negocios con grandes resultados. El prestamo que requiero es de 5.000,00
lender.occupational_info: Soy una persona que busca que cada persona en este planeta tenga la oportunidad de mejorar su estilo de vida y gozar de todas sus bondades.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I think it is a good way to help people and I especially like to help people in Ukraine, because that is where my parents were born.
lender.occupational_info: I love Shaklee products and I share information about their products with people that I know or meet.

lender.name: B&B + 5
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: I want to do a company that helps the people of my country to be organized and to develop better, a company with a clear and objective vision
lender.occupational_info: Public relationist, entrusted to create the managerial image and corporate communicator

lender.name: DiAnn & Jose
lender.loan_because: My husband and I remember all of the times that we needed extra money to get through in life. Now that we have a little extra, we are passing it on.
lender.occupational_info: Jose is a self-employed painting contractor and I work as a school secretary at our son's elementary school.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in the USA. Becuase of this I have an easy life, free of the stress that those in other countires face on a daily basis. All my needs and wants are met. My husband and I have raised 3 chidlren and have 9 grandchildren. It is time for me to help others who are not as lucky as I.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse on a labor and delivery unit at a hospital. I assist women giving birth and help them learn to feed and care for their baby after the birth.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a husband, father of two and an elementary school principal. So, basically, I spend all my time playing with kids! Pretty cool gig.

lender.name: roger
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: A small spoke in a big wheel

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that need the help and are willing to work for a better life vs. wanting a handout.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.occupational_info: I work with children who need extra help in the classroom. Most are autistic or have behavior problems. My job is behavior intervention.

lender.name: Don & Tina
lender.loan_because: We like to support other entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: We take people on outdoor adventures.

lender.name: Mahmood Remtulla
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a break or two.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make sure that computers in the work place are all communicating with each other at all times.

lender.name: chandra
lender.loan_because: I like it.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: Every little bit makes a difference and can change lives one at a time.

lender.name: Vic & Mary
lender.loan_because: We've been so fortunate in our lives, we want to share and help others achieve their own goals and dreams, improve their own lives and those of others around them. Investments in people and small businesses create a greater benefit to world society and the future of mankind than mere charity.
lender.occupational_info: Retirement to us is being free to live some lifelong dreams and being able to give something back.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I have a need to assist others in their personal success.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in law enforcement for the government.

lender.name: graciela
lender.loan_because: if we can help somebody we make the diference.
lender.occupational_info: my job is help people to buy or sell homes.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I want to share and give back. We are so very fortunate in Canada and I believe this fortune should be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a maternity ward, assisting families in welcoming their newest additions. I also work with acutely and chronically ill children on the pediatric ward and love every minute of it...

lender.name: Dawn
lender.occupational_info: I educate children. I work mostly with those in need.

lender.name: Katelyn
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to support small, grassroots initiatives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of HIV/AIDS and international development

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, like others have helped me. Thank you to those people.

lender.name: Jim
lender.occupational_info: I manage the finances, technology, and facilities of a large health charity

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: i can! for a small amount I found a way to help change someone's livelihood.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the chance to run a successful business.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Government. My husband Bradley is a scientist.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I take from the table in a country where it is easy to do so. At KIVA I can bring something back to the table. A KIVA loan helps by giving a hand-up, not a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a local courier for a familiar worldwide business. I handle customers packages that are promised to be picked up and delivered within a time-sensitive priority. In my free time I race bicycles.

lender.name: melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to reduce my guilt.
lender.occupational_info: I am a university student in Miami.

lender.name: Kissa
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help from time to time. I'd like to help lift up people who otherwise might not have that opportunity.

lender.name: Kurt and Evy
lender.loan_because: Kurt's eldest son,Tor, showed us how we could send our dreams for people who struggle out into the world.
lender.occupational_info: Kurt is a middle school teacher helping 100 middle school children from all over the world each year learn English so they can become successful. Evy is a comptroller for a small company in Oregon. Evy and I write and support poetry that is accessible, useful and enjoyable; each poem is, in a way, a micro-dream. With Poetspeak we support ordinary people anywhere put words to their dreams, fears and hopes.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I was once a struggling single parent, and I know the courage it takes to work your way out of tough times.
lender.occupational_info: I am an editor; I help writers with their books by correcting writing and grammar errors and suggesting changes that clarify their stories.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: The sum of many small actions can do great things.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 and 13 year olds in a great school. I also work with the Internet making webpages - and at a community called mosaic. Very busy, but lots of fun.

lender.name: Laura & Ryan
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed. We want to be good stewards with what God has so generously given to us. It's not okay for us to sit back and do nothing to help others. God wants us to be his hands and feet to meet the needs of people around the world. We believe everybody deserve a chance to build a better life for themelves and their families, and what a great way to help!

lender.name: Diane
lender.occupation: Mental health counselor and Google Earth Cmty Mod
lender.loan_because: Life is better with sharing. And, I admire hard-working small business owners!
lender.occupational_info: My clients have severe mental illness, such as schizophrenia. They have had hard lives and many failures, so one of the most important things I help them with is building self-respect, to feel that their lives are worth living even though they have mental illness.

lender.name: antonio
lender.loan_because: I need to establish my small-scale enterprise, to buy a small machine of endermologia and implements for a small medical consultation of social labos autosustentable
lender.occupational_info: I am employed at a small clinic with which we attend to very needy persons and a sutento indispensabel is to give you consult at reasonable prices to be able to be sustentabel and to return the offered help, we ask you for it that help us

lender.name: Henk
lender.loan_because: People in underdeveloped regions that want to make something of their lifes deserve our support.
lender.occupational_info: Help for elderly with paper work and regulations

lender.name: Kakbank
lender.loan_because: It's easy to make a little difference! And it makes us happy to help somebody!
lender.occupational_info: We're a group of friends that get together every month, each of us put in some money and together we choose projects we invest in. Meanwhile we eat cookies ("Kakbank" means "Cookie bank" in Swedish) and enjoy each others company!

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs are awesome and need support! They will change their world - and the world.
lender.occupational_info: I run a non-profit foundation.

lender.name: Linnea
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy painting horses and the rain forests. I've been to the Peruvian Amazon 6 times to take photos for my paintings.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: that's the perfect way to make a better world
lender.occupational_info: full time mum... :)

lender.name: Frederic Matuszek
lender.loan_because: This project rocks, a nice way to do our part. Take your pick and see how it works out!

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: I Can. "La solidarité la plus nécessaire est celle de l'ensemble des habitants de la terre." ( Jacquard A.)

lender.name: jean-michel
lender.loan_because: je pense que l'avenir de la planète passe par le partage

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I believe in capitalism. I also believe that we have a moral obligation to assist others.

lender.name: Kyler's grandparents
lender.loan_because: We loan because we CAN and we want to help parents give their children a better life.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: it makes sense!

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I want to give and help others.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own business cleaning houses and offices.

lender.name: Itamar
lender.loan_because: Sometimes Money Comes & Money Goes. Its time to GO...
lender.occupational_info: I make things happen mostly technical stuff but I can not truly say what I do...

lender.name: Jean-Marie Vailloud
lender.loan_because:
"No man is an Iland, intire of it selfe; every man is a peece of the Continent, a part of the maine; if a Clod bee washed away by the Sea, Europe is the lesse, as well as if a Promontorie were, as well as if a Mannor of thy friends or of thine own were; any mans death diminishes me, because I am involved in Mankinde; And therefore never send to know for whom the bell tolls; It tolls for thee."
En français:
« Aucun homme n’est une île, un tout, complet en soi ; tout homme est un fragment du continent, une partie de l’ensemble ; si la mer emporte une motte de terre, l’Europe en est amoindrie, comme si les flots avaient emporté un promontoire, le manoir de tes amis ou le tien ; la mort de tout homme me diminue, parce que j’appartiens au genre humain ; aussi n’envoie jamais demander pour qui sonne le glas : c’est pour toi qu’il sonne »
John Donne (1572-1631)

lender.name: Jeroen
lender.loan_because: the idea of "micro credit" is a constructive way of helping those in need. Plus I'm convinced Kiva is a reliable organisation which I can trust my money to.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva connects me directly to people whose lives will be improved by small loans.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to map the seafloor. My students have come from 57 countries.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Giving someone new opportunities!

lender.name: janice
lender.loan_because: I read a quote once by Mother Theresa which in essence said "just begin". We all worry and feel sad of the state of things in our world and become immobolized because we don't know where to begin. This statement motivated me to "just begin" one person, one child at a time. I know eventually if we all just take that leap of faith and reach out, even if it is to one person, it will make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: teacher of young children ages 3-5 years old

lender.name: Boulet Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help others in the world improve their lives.

lender.name: jackiegb
lender.loan_because: I believe each person has the power to make a difference

lender.name: Roger
lender.occupational_info: Silver Smith, Hand Engraver, Jeweler.

lender.name: Clasca
lender.loan_because: Great to see what a small amount of money can do for someone else in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I organise office work from A to Z

lender.name: Chitra
lender.loan_because: there are many people out there trying to make a space for themselves in the world and lending just a little help is the smallest action I can take

lender.name: dborquezm
lender.loan_because: Porque es una manera de ayudar. / Because its a way to help.
lender.occupational_info: Diseño de sistemas para producción de agua potable y para el tratamiento de aguas servidas. / Drinking water and waste water treatment facilities design.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who may not have the same chances in life that i have had. This way of lending money sounds like a great way of really doing some good with my money.
lender.occupational_info: I Usually work 40 hours a week driving a Taxi or Mini Bus which is fairly easy work. I work mainly with the elderly and Disabled. I enjoy my Job. I drive about 100 miles a day.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and this is a small way to contribute to that end.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people to analyze insurance company data using computers. My favorite part of the job is working directly with customers and helping them with their businesses.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I like to :-)
lender.occupational_info: Financial planning and analysis for a large software company

lender.name: bernard
lender.loan_because: un geste qui peut améliorer la vie d'une famille n'importe où dans le monde, c'est formidable!

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I can, and so many others cannot.
lender.occupational_info: Serving people food they want, therefore making them happy.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: kiva brings action to the concept of a global community.

lender.name: Bunderwood
lender.loan_because: I am.
lender.occupational_info: I live in the moment.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: You deserve this opportunity. Follow your dreams!

lender.name: Roberta
lender.loan_because: I can, and it's important. Hope I make a difference.

lender.name: Brad & Sarah
lender.loan_because: we like to give!
lender.occupational_info: great! I work in a potash mine as an engineer, and my wife used to work with foriegn worker placement for the federal gov't of canada, and now works with service canada....

lender.name: Hiroshi & Natalie
lender.loan_because: i would like to help those who show great potential in the future, but only need basic assistance in order to get started to pursue their path to success.
lender.occupational_info: N/A

lender.name: Daniel Cristina Denia Al
lender.loan_because: Virginita was an extremely giving individual who was loved by many and will be missed by many Queremos Ayudar - We want to help
lender.occupational_info: Virginita era generosa, amada y nos hara falta.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who want to make there lives better through hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a property management company.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: this is my mitzvah project, which is to help others.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with much, and I would like to share my fortune with others. Loaning is also a lot of fun!
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how to become a doctor!

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I want to make the lives of random people in my favorite countries better.

lender.name: Elisabeth & Martin
lender.loan_because: if not now then when ?

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I think it's great that these people are showing the initiative to be entrepreneurs in a difficult situation. It's the least I can do to help them out to get a start, or improve their situation. One person at a time, we will change the world for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I do computer programming in the corporate office of a chain of 340 convenience stores

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: The only alternative to helping others is to NOT help others.

lender.name: Khozema
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is a great feeling to help a fellow entrepreneur start out with a new business venture. I wish all of these good people the best of good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the area of process improvement as a Six Sigma Master Black Belt. The development of ideas like Kiva that solve systemic problems in this world are exactly what I try to achieve in my work.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it is to start / operate a business, I can only imagine the courage it must take to do so in those environments less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I develop websites. Entrepreneur.

lender.name: andrew
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I make the websites

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I'm just completed my Masters in Terrorism - and what better way to stop terrorism than by giving women the means to make the world work better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working to build a business to make SPairz - panties to go for women. Personal Protection. They are compressed and shrink-wrapped so they can be tucked into your gym bag, luggage, desk drawer, etc. Because sometimes it's really nice to have a spare pair!

lender.name: Joseph A. Levin
lender.occupational_info: Puns and a twist of language tickle my mind. Handwritten letters brighten my days, and I feel like it is going to rain. Coffee is a staple. Breakfast for lunch is sublime. I do not practice piano enough.

lender.name: Veronica&Jim
lender.loan_because: We have been so blessed that we want to share our good fortune. It's just the right thing to do.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.occupation: Program Cordinator for Outpaitient Drug/Alcohol Pr

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can - and there is just something about connecting with and helping people around the world that is really gratifying.
lender.occupational_info: I count beans.

lender.name: Andres & Lisa
lender.loan_because: most poor people are truly rich. We can learn a lot from these testimonies. The U.S has a commitment to the world... our state football coach makes 1.7 million a year... Yes... is sad.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: this is a great opportunity to participate in something bigger than myself and my neighborhood.
lender.occupational_info: I've been a teacher and writer, wife and mother of two adult children.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I loan because I care!

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Principal of an elementary school

lender.name: Donal
lender.loan_because: I can save and help people at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: I work on computers to make things run smoothly,hopefully...

lender.name: xavier
lender.whereabouts: santo domingo santo Domingo de los tsachilas

lender.name: Bonnie & Jack
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to help others.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want everyone to have a life blessed with good work, peace and health.
lender.occupational_info: I administer grants to small Alaskan villages to improve their environmental conditions.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: People who want to work should be given the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Vincent
lender.loan_because: I like success stories :)
lender.occupational_info: Helping to bring beauty, taste and aesthetics in our world through fashion, design and creative inspiration.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: We are ,by Gods word. to love God and to love people.This is one way that we can honor that commandment
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher of teen aged children and a school principal which is like a headmaster-I loved working with children

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: to help, to make a difference "An individual has not started living until he can rise above the narrow confines of his individualistic concerns to the broader concerns of all humanity".--mlk jr.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that a dollar amount that is small to me can make a life-changing difference to the loan recipient.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an private school in Boston, MA USA

lender.name: Evelyn
lender.loan_because: What a way to improve life and be a presence in many parts of a world made better by socially-minded bunch..... lending with no strings attached.
lender.occupational_info: I watch my grandchildren (now 5 and 3 year old boys) grow, hopefully to be responsible citizens of this world.

lender.name: Prism CGI
lender.loan_because: Our company wants to give back to our local community and to the world-wide community - to help people provide and support their families and change their communities. Our CEO flew food and medicine into Ethiopia during the 1980's and he has seen this idea work - our company now helps others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We install and fix computer servers and networks to help people do business more efficiently. Our company motto is: "Productivity without a foundation of ethics...means nothing." We believe it and we live it.

lender.name: The Zimmerman Family
lender.loan_because: this is an opportunity to make a difference.

lender.name: Belfi Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that we should give back to the community since we have been very fortunate in life so far.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: because I'm interested in how micro-lending works in the real world
lender.occupational_info: I help low-to-moderate income people buy homes in Dayton, Ohio in the United States.

lender.name: AMIN
lender.loan_because: It's our duty ...

lender.name: Ryan, Tonya and Isabella
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate to be able to give back to the many people of the world. We hope our modest contribution helps.

lender.name: Ramona
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel more connected to the world. Because I believe in the businesses. Because I want to be part of the solution.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: people need help.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: every act of kindness helps
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who have a child with a disability.

lender.name: Valarie
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy.

lender.name: HECTOR
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate than myself. I am very grateful for what I have and I want to make a difference. If your not part of the solution-then your part of the problem.
lender.occupational_info: I repair public telephones in NYC.

lender.name: Chad and Christy
lender.loan_because: We learned of Kiva through our diocese a few years ago. We are committed to the ONE Episcopalian and MDG's developed by UN and this is one way for us to help our global neighbor achieve a better future.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I loan because I believe micro lending is a great way to help reduce poverty across the globe.
lender.occupational_info: In my job we use software to solve business problems.

lender.name: Tiffany
lender.loan_because: I believe in Peter Singer's writings concerning an individual's responsibility in working towards alleviating global poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a double-major in Psychology and Sociology.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: It gets resources directly to worthy folks around the world - a powerful and important concept.
lender.occupational_info: We help youth and adults think about, talk about and "do" money in ways that honor their values.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed if they work hard.
lender.occupational_info: Motorcycle service and online parts sales

lender.name: Ian Tyndall
lender.loan_because: The Tyndall Foundation was formed to transfer the proceeds from an aggressively managed options trading portfolio into a diversified lending program that provides for opportunities in lesser developed countries.
lender.occupational_info: The Tyndall Foundation closely watches global economic trends to identify investment opportunities that yield 50% or greater returns on investment. 15% of the annual profit from options trading is invested in microlending.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that money I loan will help someone become successful in a business. More business opportunity will lead to a more peaceful world.
lender.occupational_info: I am the publisher of a small magazine owned by a large company in New York. Most of our revenue is generated by advertising sales.

lender.name: Jennifer & Ben
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! Our resources are blessings and should be used to help those in need. Plus, it feels good to give to deserving people.
lender.occupational_info: I teach social studies to 6th grade students. My husband helps people buy and sell houses. We love to travel during the summer together and see other parts of the word.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: Many people have helped me at various points in my life. It's nice to be able to help out other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to use computer programs.

lender.name: Mike Horrocks
lender.loan_because: We should all be of one heart, of one mind, and there should be no poor among us.
lender.occupational_info: By day, I help banks be more efficient. By night, I help change the world one micro-opportunity at a time.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: ...intelligent and novel ways of helping others really appeals to me!
lender.occupational_info: I work as an Environmental Engineer specialized in hazardous waste management.

lender.name: Shaina
lender.loan_because: I believe with a little financial help anyone with motivation and talent can succeed. Many people just don't have the financial opportunity that many of us have enjoyed. Kiva enables us to help others become successful and be able to support their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I privately teach needle arts to many different people who love to create clothing. Instead of celebrating holidays this year with gifts and presents, we are instead loaning the money we would have spent to provide Kiva loans to people engaged in any activity related to clothing construction.

lender.name: Nelia
lender.loan_because: I respect people who are trying to make their own way in the world, especially when they are working with few resources and are still determined and optimistic. It is a pleasure to be able to help.

lender.name: COM100AB Phoenix College
lender.occupation: Intro to Human Comm class at Phoenix College
lender.loan_because: We hope to change lives and make a difference in the world. We want to give others the chance to accomplish their dreams through help with the expansion of their business.
lender.occupational_info: We are not just making loans. We are helping enrich the world.

lender.name: Martin
lender.occupational_info: soy trabajor independiente

lender.name: COM100 Phoenix College
lender.occupation: Intro to Comm class Phoenix College
lender.loan_because: To assist those in need who are less fortunate than ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: We encourage financial growth to those who need assistance in their economy by providing microloans.

lender.name: Lynda
lender.loan_because: It feels good to give

lender.name: george
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed and would like to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I make dirty water safe and clean for my community to drink. I run the water plant that sends the water out to my township for drinking.

lender.name: Jagannath
lender.loan_because: Many helped me by investing in me. I hope I can help more people and see the joy of helping one another.
lender.occupational_info: Software developer and real estate investor

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been helped by the generosity of others and this is my way of giving back.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is nearly impossible for these people otherwise. A tiny investment can literally change a person's life and at the same time positively impact their community.
lender.occupational_info: I work with images and ideas.

lender.name: Suzy
lender.occupation: non profit NPR Radio sales director

lender.name: K Diane
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people across the world start or build their small businesses. I wish everyone the best of success,
Quiero ayudar gente por todo el mundo a comenzar y construir sus negócios. Espero que les vaya muy bien.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from my government job. I now manage house rentals. I also raise horses and chickens on my small farm.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I believe in Kiva.org and am committed to unrelentingly pursuing the advancement of social justice for all.
lender.occupational_info: I help prison-involved individuals who are homeless, with mental health issues that have severe drug and alcohol problems. I also started and serve as the director of a homeless youth shelter for lesbian, gay, bisexual and transgender youth in New York City (www.trinityplaceshelter.org)

lender.name: Nahid
lender.loan_because: all entrepreneurs deserve an equal chance.
lender.occupational_info: I make really small sensors.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing. Generosity and sharing with those less fortunate is a Biblical command I strongly adhere to. I very much want to be a good steward of the resources that God has entrusted to me, and I believe that we should do that in a way that does not create a sense of dependency or demean those on the "recieving" end. I love the concept of micro-loaning as it empowers people, often breaks a long cycle of poverty, and is a gift that keeps on giving. THANK YOU KIVA for your brilliant model.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a large Christian church focused on loving God and serving our neighbors, both locally and globally. My daily goals are to connect the members of our congregation with opportunities to meet the needs of the poor, thereby modeling Jesus Christ and making His name known around the world.

lender.name: Jeanvieve
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to be in a position where $25 at the right moment can change everything.

lender.name: Tray and Jenny
lender.loan_because: After hearing about kiva.org, it just seemed like a simple way to reach out and love people we dont even know. Reading their stories, you can hear the desire to take care of their families, which is really a basic desire we all have. The small amount these folks need to actually make a difference in their lives is staggering.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pastor at a church plant in Austin Texas. Our desire as a church, is to be defined by how we love God and others. Matthew 25:40 The King will reply, 'I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me.'

lender.name: Het
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the right to make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I can help someone's dream come true!

lender.name: Vipul
lender.loan_because: it is very satisfying to be able to make a meaningful difference in a fellow human being's life.

lender.name: Kirstee and Ashly
lender.loan_because: we loan because we are fulfilling our dreams and we want other people to have the opportunity to fulfill theirs :-)
lender.occupational_info: Kirstee is a stay-at-home mum and Ashly is a steel fixer

lender.name: Daniel Ahiakpor
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide the facilities needed for us to do great things in this wonderful world we share.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales & business development for Adap.tv and study at NYU's Stern School of Business.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I feel it is a good and sensible way to support another person in need. It is direct and personal.
lender.occupational_info: I advise banks in business issues, mostly IT or process related

lender.name: Nasra, Oman
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are in need.

lender.name: Pauline
lender.loan_because: I see it as a constructive way to enable people. Rather than just providing 'band-aid' assistance it actually empowers people.
lender.occupational_info: I work closely with not-for-profit disability organisations.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Helps others to help themselves...

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I can spare a bit that other people desperately need...

lender.name: Serene
lender.loan_because: I believe that this idea works
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Communications deprtment of an audit and accounting firm and also work actively on corporate social responsibility initiatives in the Middle East

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I believe that everybody deserves a beautiful life for himself and for his family. But many people can't do it by themselves, they need some support. I believe that we should help these people to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: Student French-Spanish

lender.name: Lisbeth G-N
lender.loan_because: I love the concept; it's just so easy sitting at home making a little difference. I'd like to think that it matters to the entrepreneurs that people around the world actually cares.
lender.occupational_info: Have been a social worker among young people most of my adult life, now working at a psykiatric home.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: I would like to see children from all over the world have the same opportunities my children have

lender.name: Michael Day
lender.loan_because: I love to lend a hand and...I believe that Kiva is one of the finest ways anyone can break the trance of restrictions while the planet makes its way through its financial crisis. If someone tells me they just lost their job, I often respond by suggesting that they immediately fund one person on Kiva and experience the remarkable empowerment that comes from this.
lender.occupational_info: I love to work towards world peace by helping anyone end the war within. I also love to ask people questions that invite them to discover that Life is nowhere near as limited as they thought it was often just a moment before!

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you live a blessed life in a prosperous society, it is your duty to give back and help up those that aren't as lucky. As human beings, we're all the same and I think it's our responsibility to help those who can't help themselves. "With great power comes great responsibility." -Spiderman

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I can afford it and I like the idea that my little contribution can make somone in need's life better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm developing softwares that help in aircraft maintenance.

lender.name: inge
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Iesha
lender.loan_because: Throughout life there were helping hands that lifted me up. I now want to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I sell electricity to non-deregulated areas.

lender.name: Iain
lender.occupation: Academic tutor/amateur chicken and bee keeper
lender.loan_because: Its just a really easy way to do something worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a leading Scottish charity which supports people with learning disabilities to access the sort of opportunities others take for granted.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to be self-supporting and successful. We live in abudance in the U.S. and it's a privilege to be able to share the wealth.
lender.occupational_info: I keep our computers, printers and network working. Our computers are connected to each other through the network so we can share information.

lender.name: Said
lender.occupational_info: I need some money for begining my improve work who i can produce much positions. thanks

lender.name: Greg & Cheryl
lender.loan_because: We have been very blessed in our lives and we would like to help others when we can. Kiva seems to be a wonderful method for individuals to help other individuals in a very direct way.
lender.occupational_info: Greg is a retired law enforcement officer. Cheryl is a judge.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Make the world a better place!

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: At one time or another we've all needed help.

lender.name: Lisa and Mike
lender.loan_because: Sometime we all need a little help to follow our dreams and do good in this world.

lender.name: Bpt 7th grade
lender.loan_because: This is service project for our class.
lender.occupational_info: Students and teachers in the 7th grade.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because:
Jesus has blessed me so that I can be a blessing to others - spreading His glory throughout the world.
"For you know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ, that though he was rich, yet for your sake he became poor, so that you by his poverty might become rich." ~ 2 Corinthians 8:9
lender.occupational_info: I teach Elementary school.

lender.name: Juan
lender.occupation: Asesor de Proyecto/Estudiante de Comunicacion Soc
lender.loan_because: For sales of bedding, towels and clothing in general and to raise funds and support to the foundation with the profits
lender.occupational_info: Working coordinator of the Foundation Refuge House of God Venezuela, in the city of Merida Venezuela, to help children, girls, the problem of disability and comprehensive care for children in extreme poverty, and we have no support from the state

lender.name: ryan
lender.loan_because: I aspire to be a loan shark when I grow up. This seems like good practice.

lender.name: Steve & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We had read about microfinance and the help it brings to small business people. We are small business people and thought this was a wonderful idea.
lender.occupational_info: We are Realtors and represent buyers and sellers in the purchase and sale of homes.

lender.name: michael
lender.loan_because: It does something. Microfinance is not the solution, but it does bring developed and developing nations together. It gives people who want to work the chance they don't have otherwise. it gives those in developing countries access to capital they would never have
lender.occupational_info: I run the technology department of a small art supply company.

lender.name: María del Carmen
lender.loan_because: Yo necesito el crédito porque en el momento estoy en el montaje de un taller para la producción de artesanias específicamente ilumanación.
lender.occupational_info: Nuestra empresa fue creada para ser un puente de comercialización de los artesanos y es un ejemplo a nivel nacional e internacional, tenemos una tienda virtual que ofrece todos los productos que elaboran nuestros artesanas y artesanas.

lender.name: Pedro F. Lebre
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving people a chance to succeed is an important step that is often overlooked when trying to find solutions to end poverty. I feel that lending money helps build sustainable communities in developing countries. I want to support economic growth rather than provide charity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time student of History and Education as well as a great Portuguese-American.

lender.name: Albert & Dawn
lender.loan_because: Having spent time in Southeast Asia I am constantly amazed with the spirit of the people. So many of them are working to support their families under conditions most Americans could not fathom.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I Like to help others
lender.occupational_info: Making it E-Z for millions

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: a friend of mine gave me a kiva gift certificate. What a great idea!

lender.name: anneke
lender.loan_because: once someone gave me a loan that saved me. You own something as soon as you can give it away.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to find them self

lender.name: dan
lender.loan_because: It's just a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: In charge of landscape maintenance for 2 community colleges.

lender.name: PATRICIA
lender.loan_because: I AM AN ENTREPRENEUR AND I WANT TO HELP PEOPLE WHO NEED TO START THEIR BUSINESSES IN COUNTRIES WHERE IT IS MUCH HARDER TO GET FUNDING.
lender.occupational_info: OUR COMPANY COMPOUNDS AND SELLS PLASTIC RAW MATERIALS FROM WHICH OUR CUSTOMERS MAKE A WIDE VARIETY OF PRODUCTS.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: working together we can build a much better world....

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that giving a little means not a "little" but a "whole lot" to someone else. I live in Canada where I am blessed with all the good things in life. To be able to make a difference in someone else's life means a lot to me. It is the right thing to do! "If there is any kindness or good thing I can do for my fellow being, let me do it now. For I shall pass this way but once." W.C. Gannett
lender.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, I spend my leisure time with my family and my many, many friends. I also enjoy gardening, reading, photography and my two precious little dogs, Daisie and Teddy Dash Bear.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: I like it
lender.occupational_info: I write users manuals that no one reads

lender.name: Phil
lender.loan_because: My mom is from Peru, I have seen the poverty. I am in a position to help, and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Teacher

lender.name: Anje
lender.loan_because: I like the 'Kiva' concept! Thank you Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am a secondary school teacher.

lender.name: Ed & DeAnn
lender.loan_because: We admire what these individuals are working toward, and love the idea of being in contact to know the progress of their accomplishments.
lender.occupational_info: Manager/ Mother and college student

lender.name: Premi
lender.loan_because: it is needed
lender.occupational_info: I am happy to help others who want to better their lives.
